article_title: Jeb Bush and the Power of Positive Thinking
article_text:
Jeb Bush was winding through remarks to the U.S.’s National Automobile Dealers Association a few days ago when he struck what figures to be the central but little-appreciated tenet of his likely presidential campaign.

What, he was asked, is the most important message for Republicans to offer voters?

“Hope,” he replied succinctly. “I...

twitter.description: If a Jeb Bush presidential campaign is launched—and it’s now virtually certain one soon will be—the idea of promoting optimism and positive thinking will be a central part of its mission statement.
twitter.title: Jeb Bush and the Power of Positive Thinking

image.alt: Jeb Bush promotes the power of positive thinking for Republicans

article_summary:
“Hope,” he replied succinctly.
Jeb Bush was winding through remarks to the U.S.’s National Automobile Dealers Association a few days ago when he struck what figures to be the central but little-appreciated tenet of his likely presidential campaign.
What, he was asked, is the most important message for Republicans to offer voters?
